description:
Finally, a fall lawn kit for large lawns

Grow a greener fall lawn with premium granular fertilizer and weed control.

Designed for the fall season, this kit promotes deep greening and sustained growth while eliminating fall weeds. Fast-acting nitrogen, iron, and nutrient-rich kelp provide immediate growth and resilience, while slow-release nitrogen, calcium, leaf compost, and wood ash strengthen your soil for long-lasting health.

A Sunday premium selection

Enriched with potent nutrients and unique soil enhancers, our premium fertilizers outperform standard options for superior, long-lasting lawn health.

sections.kit_features_benefits:
Formulated for deep greening and sustained growth into fall
Eliminates fall weeds to reduce spring weed growth
Fast-acting weed control for dandelions, clover, moss, and more
Builds healthier soil over time
Ready-to-use with your push spreader
Suitable for all grass types
Ideal for lawns up to 4,000 sq. ft. Larger lawns may require 2-3 kits.
sections.whats_included:
Core Seagreen : 12 lbs. Premium 24-0-4 NPK granular fertilizer. Covers up to 4,000 sq. ft.
Core Endurance : 12 lbs. Premium 23-0-3 NPK granular fertilizer. Covers up to 4,000 sq. ft.
Dandelion Doom Herbicide Concentrate Refill : 5 oz. iron-based herbicide concentrate. Treats up to 224 sq. ft.
Herbicide Pouch + Sprayer : Reusable, easy-fill gallon pouch and premium Powerhouse™ wand sprayer for easy application.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply early morning or late evening to a well-hydrated lawn in the spring or fall. Already have a push spreader? Our granular fertilizer is ready-to-use with your spreader.
Apply Dandelion Doom. Assemble the Dandelion Doom herbicide starter kit (pouch, concentrate, wand), then spot treat small weeds and dense patches. Fully drench leaves and allow it to dry completely for best results.
Apply Core Seagreen. Apply uniformly across the lawn at a consistent pace and thoroughly water in for best results. Let the lawn dry before doing anything else.
Reapply Dandelion Doom every 3-4 weeks, or as needed until weeds are no longer actively growing.
After 6 weeks, apply Core Endurance following the method above. If it's too late in the season (mid-October), save for next season and apply in spring.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How is Sunday granular fertilizer different from traditional fertilizers?
Most granular fertilizers stop at nutrition. Sunday granulated are the complete care package. Our formulas combine slow-release nutrients with soil-building ingredients and specialized formulations (with surfactant or kelp) that help your lawn stay resilient during summer heatwaves.
When should I fertilize my lawn in the fall?
We recommend applying your fall nutrients while you are still seeing active growth in your lawn. This varies by climate, but for cool and transitional regions, complete your applications by October. For warm-season grasses, it may be earlier.
How should I use the fertilizer bags in my kit if my lawn is less than 4,000 sq. ft.?
Core Seagreen and Core Endurance cover up to 4,000 sq. ft.
500-1,000 sq. ft.: Apply 1/4 of a bag (4 uses)
1,000-2,000 sq. ft.: Apply 1/2 of a bag (2 uses)
2,000-3,000 sq. ft.: Apply 3/4 of a bag
3,000-4,000 sq. ft.: Apply full bag
Save any remaining fertilizer for next spring.
How to apply alongside other Sunday products
Sunday fertilizers are made to work together! For granular fertilizers, wait 4-6 weeks before applying more fertilizer or switching to a different Sunday fertilizer. For all other lawn products, let the fertilizer dry on the lawn first, then apply other products.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on my lawn after applying?
Our ingredients break down quickly and don’t persist in the environment. Once the product is watered in and your lawn dries, it’s safe for people and pets to resume activities!
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This kit is approved for use in all states.
